name: The Prabbits: Air Dogfight
description:
Game description

You are a prabbit (mix of rabbit and parrot) who needs proving they are the best pilot in their class by winning a last man standing tournament. Beware your ammunition and the perm death bombs!

The rules are:

  • you need to win 5 rounds to win a tournament
  • to be killed by a perm death bomb eliminate you from the tournament

Hence, even if you have no victories, you can still make a twist and win the tournament by using successfully a bomb.

NOTE: there will be one new game mode and new levels coming in the future, stay tuned! 

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/Nodragem! 

Playtesting and Feedback

I release this early access version of the game to collect feedback; the final version will be on window/mac/linux and maybe consoles.

Please let me a comment on what you've liked about the game, what needs to be improved, and/or what features you would like to see in the next versions of the game. Any ideas welcome!

Controls

Using a XBOX360 controllers, the controls are:

  • Left/right to turn anti-clockwise/clockwise, respectively
  • A to shoot a bullet
  • B to shoot a bomb
  • X to buy bullets
  • Y to buy a bomb

Using a keyboard, you can play up to 2 players locally:

  • A/D or left/right arrows to turn anti-clockwise/clockwise, respectively
  • C or ' to shoot a bullet
  • V or ; to shoot a bomb
  • B or L to buy bullets
  • N or K to buy a bomb
How the multiplayer work

NOTE: This is an early version of the game and future updates will add the possibility to view/create/join rooms.

  • Select a minimum amount of players to start
  • Add up to 4 players locally
  • Wait for online players to join your party if the local players aren't adding up to the minimum amount of players you selected above.
Future additions:

- New game modes:

  • Rabbit Hunt: only the player with the rabbit totem is vulnerable; get rid of the totem as quick as possible and throw it to another player!

- New levels coming:

  • Weighs Like a Lid: the top and bottom clouds of the level are slowly moving to the center. Stay too long in the clouds and you explode
  • Vertical Skill: the level allows only vertical screen wrapping
  • Monster in A Cage: watch your stray bullets, for if the cage breaks, everybody will be in trouble!
  • and more...

- Adding Create/Join Room Menu

- Improvement in UI
